claus_strandberg.notes: The long running Marrakesh meta strategy that is a one off for every spin excluding consumed, drowning, fire, or electrocution

claus_strandberg.name: Office
claus_strandberg.requires: Door opening device (lock pick, crowbar, keycard)
claus_strandberg.notes: Great for instant Claus kills or remote setups

claus_strandberg.name: Lockdown
claus_strandberg.notes: Preferred strategy for spins with 2 market disguises, only faster if Claus is isolated before sitting

claus_strandberg.name: Honeycomb
claus_strandberg.notes: Found eventually if left in the tunnels, guestimate at 7:00+

reza_zaydan.name: Office
reza_zaydan.notes: Great for remote explosive weapon kills or explosion accident kills

reza_zaydan.name: Intercom Lure
reza_zaydan.notes: The end all be all of Marrakesh and should be used for most spins

reza_zaydan.name: Double Sieker
reza_zaydan.notes: There is only one puke spot in the school, therefore if you emetic someone before Reza he will leave the school and go to the consulate area. Alternative with durain https://youtu.be/eemHi6O6KIg

reza_zaydan.name: Prisoner Lure
reza_zaydan.timings: All Timings excluding Reza in the prisoner room (2:00 + 4:00 cycles)
reza_zaydan.notes: Uses the Prisoner mission story and puts Reza on a leash, if any soldier or Reza finds the prisoner is knocked out or missing Reza will enter a lockdown, knocked out prisoner is an instant rip as they will kill him immediately
